entries.text: As I understand, if there is a security issue it is in CPAN.pm and the command line CPAN client and not the CPAN service as one might thing from the title. Also everyone can have running access to a Windows machine, e.g. by using GitHub Actions. However, I agree with the sentiment behind the rhetorical question: "Why are there so many patches/pull-requests waiting to be applied in so many open source projects?" I know the answer (or some answers) I just don't know what is the solution.
